en.content: Another cry splits the gloom. It is the same unearthly call you heard when you entered the first patch of woodland, but this time with a grating undertone that makes you shiver. It seems closer.

zh.content: 又一声嗥叫划破黑暗。它和你进入第一片树林时听到的怪异叫声相类，但这次还混入了刺耳的低音，令你直打哆嗦。它似乎在接近。

text.en: Take refuge in a tree for the night
